item.title: Building a REST API with FastAPI
item.description: FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.6+ based on standard Python type hints.

item.title: How to link and display your latest blog posts to your Github profile
item.description: In this guide, we'll see an easy way of linking our latest blog posts to our Github profile using a 3rd party package.

item.title: How to create and edit your Github profile
item.description: In this how to guide, let's see how we can create a Github profile page and styling it to display stats, images, and much more to make it look the way we like it

item.title: How to add RSS feed to Next.js site
item.description: In this post we'll see an easy way to add an rss feed to your Next.Js website without writing XML

item.title: My personal portfolio got some improvements
item.description: Let's see how and why I migrated my blog from Gatsby-Sanity to Next-MDX.

item.title: 5 Common mistakes beginners make when learning to code
item.description: In this article, we check on some of the most common mistakes beginners make when starting to learn how to write code.

item.title: Back-End vs Front-End Web Development
item.description: Let's see what is Front End and Back End Development and what are the differences between each.

item.title: How to add pagination to Gatsby site
item.description: In this tutorial, we learn how to add pagination to a Gatsby Blog that uses Sanity io headless CMS or any CMS.

item.title: Build projects build knowledge build a foundation
item.description: In this post, we examine the importance of building our own projects and how it will help us improve as a programmer

item.title: What is the tutorial hell and how to escape it
item.description: In this post we write about tutorial hell. A big concern of every beginner programmer, we will see exactly what is tutorial hell, why it is dangerous for developers and how to escape it.

item.title: How to add dynamic routes to Next.js blog with Sanity.io content
item.description: In this post, we look into how to fetch data from Sanity headless CMS and render dynamic pages using Next.js for a blog-style site.

item.title: How to make a blog with Next.js and Sanity.io
item.description: Let's learn how to create a blog website using Next.js and the headless CMS Sanity.

item.title: Should I learn more than one programming language at the same time?
item.description: A very common question. We evaluated the pros and cons of learning one or more programming languages at the same time.

item.title: Choosing your developer path
item.description: In this post, we have an overview of all the possible paths that we can take as a developer

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Welcome to my small piece of the internet, dedicated to my journey as a self-taught developer
